top.title: US lawmakers tell BBC Andrew should testify over Epstein files
top.summary: It comes after the King said the Royal Family were "ready to support" police in their inquiries.

top.title: Watch: BBC in Tehran for first time since protest crackdown
top.summary: Lyse Doucet reports from Iran, where she says the pain is still raw after unprecedented force was used to put down the protests there.

top.title: Netanyahu to meet Trump as Iran nuclear talks reach critical stage
top.summary: The Israeli prime minister is expected to press Trump to pursue a deal that would halt Iran's uranium enrichment.

top.title: Apple and Google agree to change app stores after 'effective duopoly' claim
top.summary: The UK's markets regulator says the proposed commitments "will boost the UK's app economy".

top.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial hears
top.summary: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles

top.title: Discord to start requiring face scan or ID to access adult content
top.summary: The online chat service, which has 200 million monthly users, will blur adult content by default.

title.#text: The Toyota Highlander is now a three-row electric SUV with 320 miles of range
